Class AttendeeRegister

java.lang.Object
camppackage.AttendeeRegister
All Implemented Interfaces:
CampRegister
public class AttendeeRegister extends Object implements CampRegister

Implements CampRegister interface

Class is responsiple for handling registration of attendees into a camp
